title: Harvey Weinstein found guilty in second sex crimes trial
description: The 70-year-old is already serving 23 years in jail after he was convicted in New York two years ago.

title: Panel calls for Trump to face insurrection charge
description: The committee airs critical testimony by a Trump loyalist and criticises his daughter, Ivanka Trump.

title: Ukraine to boost Belarus border defences as Putin meets Lukashenko
description: Kyiv fears a fresh Russian assault is on the horizon after President Putin travelled to Minsk.

title: Venezuelans ignore dangers of Darién jungle
description: A record number of people attempt the trek this year on foot in search of a better life in the US.

title: In pictures: France receive heroes' welcome in Paris after World Cup heartbreak
description: The French national team are met by thousands in Paris after losing to Argentina on Sunday.

title: At Hanukkah event Biden slams 'venom' of antisemitism
description: At the Jewish festival of lights, Mr Biden took a moment to slam a "venom" of hatred on the rise globally.

title: Amber Heard settles defamation case against Johnny Depp
description: Ms Heard will pay her ex-husband $1m after jury found she had defamed him in a Washington Post article.

title: British Airways: Flights leaving US grounded over technical issue
description: British Airways apologises to passengers left waiting in airports and on runways across the US.

title: Elon Musk: Twitter users vote in favour of boss resigning
description: Some 57.5% of users voted "yes" when Elon Musk asked them if he should quit as Twitter's chief executive.

title: Vaughan condo shooting: Three victims were on condo board
description: Police said the gunman, who lived in the building, killed five people in three separate units.

title: Chaos as severe turbulence hits Hawaiian Airlines plane
description: At least 36 people were injured, 11 seriously, during the passenger jet's flight to Honolulu.

title: EU nations agree gas price cap to shield consumers
description: The cap will kick in if prices breach 180 euros per megawatt hour for three days running.

title: Fortnite settles child privacy and trickery claims
description: Epic Games pays $520m over claims it violated child privacy laws and tricked players into making purchases.

title: Ethiopia civil war: The boy named ‘Wealthy’ who weighs half what he should
description: Ethiopia's civil war has left tens of thousands, including large numbers of children, malnourished.

title: Poachers target hippos for giant teeth in place of ivory
description: As bans on elephant ivory are tightened, poachers are killing hippos for their teeth, experts warn.

title: ‘We long for Ukraine - but our son has chances here’
description: For some disabled refugees, fleeing Ukraine has given a better quality of life, provoking a dilemma.

title: The cargo hauling aircraft with no pilots on board
description: Rejecting deliveries to the doorstep, some drone makers are betting on bigger pilot-free aircraft.

title: Explaining the criminal charges January 6 committee recommended for Trump
description: The 6 January committee says there's enough evidence to prosecute the former president on four charges.

title: Thailand warship capsizes during storm
description: Video from the Thai Navy shows the ship on its side, as it is about to capsize.

title: World Cup 2022: 'Argentina really needed this win'
description: Victory in the 2022 World Cup has bought relief to many in a country facing continuing economic problems.

title: German cathedral school allows girl choristers after 1,000 years
description: In Germany, the Regensburg cathedral school has founded a separate girls choir.

title: Ukrainians install Christmas 'tree of invincibility'
description: The tree in Mykolaiv is made from camouflage nets which will be donated to soldiers in the new year.

title: Peru-Bolivia border blocked by protesters
description: Demonstrators have prevented travellers crossing a border between Peru and Bolivia, after protesting for early elections.

title: Ukraine missile struck as mum sat with child to do homework
description: Several people die after an attack on a residential building in the central Ukrainian city of Kryvyi Rih.
